title: Property Data Trust Framework Transaction Schema
description: A schema defining the PDTF transaction data structure, supporting mapping to BASPI, Law Society and RICS Data Schema elements.

materialFacts.title: Material facts at the point of marketing
materialFacts.description: BASPI v2.0 Part A - Disclosure of material facts at the point of marketing, supporting mapping to BASPI, Law Society, NTS and RICS Data Schema elements.

isNewBuild.title: Is the property a New Build?

hasDelayFactors.title: Are you aware of any factors which might delay or complicate the sale?
hasDelayFactors.description: E.g. family split, pending application for grant of probate, absent seller or unregistered title? If yes, provide details and likely timescale for delay (if known)

ownershipsToBeTransferred.title: Ownerships to be transferred on sale

ownershipType.title: What type of ownership is the property?
ownershipType.description: A Managed Freehold is any freehold where there are shared amenities, the maintenance of which you pay for through an estate rentcharge, service charge, informal or formal contribution. Choose Leasehold if your property is under a Shared Ownership arrangement.

wholeFreeholdForSale.title: Is the entire freehold being sold?
wholeFreeholdForSale.description: If not, describe the share for sale (e.g. Ground floor flat only)

annualServiceCharge.title: Amount of current annual service charge/estate rentcharge/maintenance contribution (£)

largeAdditionalExpense.title: Have you received notice of any large expense in addition to the annual payment?
largeAdditionalExpense.description: If yes, please provide details and confirm whether there is a reserve fund or sinking fund which will cover the cost of the works.

freeholderContactDetails.title: The contact details of the freeholder or rentcharge owner

managingAgentContactDetails.title: The contact details of the managing agent

managementCompanyDirectorRequirement.title: Is the owner of the property required to become a director in a management company for the maintenance of shared amenities?

isSharedOwnership.title: Is the property under Shared Owenership or a Part-buy Part-rent arrangement?

rentIncrease.title: Does the ground rent increase?
rentIncrease.description: Please provide full details of the ground rent increase e.g. how often and by how much and when the next increase is due.

annualServiceCharge.title: Amount of current annual service charge/estate rentcharge/maintenance contribution (£)

largeAdditionalExpense.title: Have you received notice of any large expense in addition to the annual payment?
largeAdditionalExpense.description: If yes, please provide details and confirm whether there is a reserve fund or sinking fund which will cover the cost of the works.

freeholderContactDetails.title: The name, address and email address of the freeholder or rentcharge owner

managingAgentContactDetails.title: The name, address and email address of the managing agent

managementCompanyDirectorRequirement.title: Is the owner of the property required to become a director in a management company for the maintenance of shared amenities?

parkingArrangementsType.title: What type of parking arrangements are there?

otherParkingType.title: Please describe the other parking arrangements

controlledParking.title: Is the property in a controlled parking zone or within a local authority parking scheme?

electricVehicleChargingPoint.title: Is there an electric vehicle charging point belonging to the property?

isListed.title: Is the property a listed building in England or Wales?
isListed.description: If yes, please provide details of the listing and any relevant documents

isConservationArea.title: Is the property in a designated conservation area?
isConservationArea.description: If yes, please provide details of the listing and any relevant documents

hasTreePreservationOrder.title: To your knowledge, does a tree preservation order apply to any trees within the boundaries of the property?

workCarriedOut.title: If work has been carried out to any trees which are protected by the order, were the relevant consents obtained? Provide any relevant documentation

isStandardForm.title: Is the property built in a standard form of construction? E.g. brick and/or block with timber-supported roof comprising a tile or slate cover?

hasFlammableExternalWallSystem.title: Does the property have potentially flammable external wall system - including cladding and balconies etc?
hasFlammableExternalWallSystem.description: If yes, please give details and attach an EWS form or state if none is to hand

energyEfficiencyRating.title: Energy Efficiency Rating
energyEfficiencyRating.description: What is the energy efficiency rating of the property according to the latest Energy Performance Certificate (EPC)?

hasSprayFoamInstalled.title: Has spray foam insulation been installed at the property?
hasSprayFoamInstalled.description: If yes, please give details together with certification from BBA or KIWA and the installation warranty for the work carried out.

councilTaxBand.title: Which Council Tax band does this property fall within?

councilTaxAffectingAlterations.title: Have you altered the property in any way to the extent that it might change the Council Tax band e.g. added a bedroom or substantially extended the property?

councilTaxAnnualCharge.title: What is the current annual Council Tax charge? (£)

hasDisputesAndComplaints.title: Have any disputes or complaints occurred, or any actions taken place which might lead to a dispute, regarding this property, a property nearby, or their use? E.g boundary disagreement, noise, trespass etc

alterationsAndChanges.title: Alterations and Changes to the Property

hasStructuralAlterations.title: Have there been any structural alterations, extensions, significant repairs or renewals to the property?  (e.g. extensions, loft or garage conversion, removal of internal walls or chimneys)

buildingRegApproval.title: Was building regulation approval and a completion certificate obtained or an equivalent Competent Person Scheme Certificate?

deedRestrictionConsent.title: Was any consent under a restriction in the deeds obtained? E.g. if your deeds require consent from someone else to alter or extend the property

unfinished.title: Are any of the works listed above unfinished?

hasStructuralAlterations.description: If yes, for each change, please outline the nature of the work and provide the dates of all work underaken.

changeOfUse.title: Has there been any change of use (e.g. from an office to a residence?

buildingRegApproval.title: Was building regulation approval and a completion certificate obtained or an equivalent Competent Person Scheme Certificate?

deedRestrictionConsent.title: Was any consent under a restriction in the deeds obtained? E.g. if your deeds require consent from someone else to alter or extend the property

unfinished.title: Are any of the works listed above unfinished?

changeOfUse.description: If yes, please confirm the year the change was completed.

windowReplacementsSince2002.title: Since 1st April 2002 has replacement of any windows, roof windows, roof lights, glazed doors taken place?

buildingRegApproval.title: Was building regulation approval and a completion certificate obtained or an equivalent Competent Person Scheme Certificate?

deedRestrictionConsent.title: Was any consent under a restriction in the deeds obtained? E.g. if your deeds require consent from someone else to alter or extend the property

unfinished.title: Are any of the works listed above unfinished?

windowReplacementsSince2002.description: If yes, for each installation, please outline the nature of the work and confirm the year the installation was completed.

hasAddedConservatory.title: Has a conservatory been added?

buildingRegApproval.title: Was building regulation approval and a completion certificate obtained or an equivalent Competent Person Scheme Certificate?

deedRestrictionConsent.title: Was any consent under a restriction in the deeds obtained? E.g. if your deeds require consent from someone else to alter or extend the property

unfinished.title: Are any of the works listed above unfinished?

hasAddedConservatory.description: If yes, confirm the year the installation was completed and whether any walls were removed, an exterior quality door separates the conservatory from the main building and, since the conservatory was added, has any replacement or refurbishment of the roof been undertaken that reduces the glazed area of the roof?

planningPermissionBreaches.title: Are you aware of any breaches of planning permission conditions or building regulations consent conditions or work not having the necessary consents?

willingToInsure.title: If yes, confirm whether you will pay for an insurance policy if the Local Authority still have power to enforce the breach.  Your property lawyer can obtain a quote for you.  (If you already have a policy please give it to your property lawyer and include details in Question 6 of Section B) [*Note: It will be a term of the insurance policy that the Local Authority is not contacted so if you have contacted the Local Authority the option of indemnity insurance will not be available.]

unresolvedPlanningIssues.title: Are you aware of any unresolved planning or building control issues?

willingToInsure.title: If yes, confirm whether you will pay for an insurance policy if the Local Authority still have power to enforce the breach.  Your property lawyer can obtain a quote for you.  (If you already have a policy please give it to your property lawyer and include details in Question 6 of Section B) [*Note: It will be a term of the insurance policy that the Local Authority is not contacted so if you have contacted the Local Authority the option of indemnity insurance will not be available.]

notices.title: Notices which Affect the Property
notices.description: Are you aware of, or have you received, any of the following notices?

neighbourDevelopment.title: The owner of a neighbouring property is proposing to develop property or land nearby, make alterations to nearby buildings or change the use?

planningApplication.title: Any planning application that could affect the property, the enjoyment of it or the views from it?

requiredMaintenance.title: Notice informing you that maintenance, repairs or improvements are required to your property?

infrastructureProject.title: Infrastructure project, proposed or in progress (i.e. wind turbine, railway, fracking, etc)

partyWallAct.title: Notice under the Party Wall Act 1996 in respect of any shared or party boundaries?

dryRotEtcTreatment.title: To your knowledge, has there been any preventative work for, or treatment of dry rot, wet rot or damp carried out at the property?

containsAsbestos.title: To your knowledge, does any part of your property contain asbestos?
containsAsbestos.description: If yes, please state whether there is a management plan in place and attach a copy

japaneseKnotweed.title: To your knowledge, is the property or neighbouring land, affected by Japanese knotweed or other invasive species?
japaneseKnotweed.description: If so please state whether there is a management plan in place and attach a copy

subsidenceOrStructuralFault.title: To your knowledge, has the property ever been subject to subsidence or structural fault?

ongoingHealthOrSafetyIssue.title: Have you been notified by a relevant authority or qualified expert of an on-going health or safety issue with the property?

fixturesAndFittings.title: Fixtures and Fittings
fixturesAndFittings.description: This is so a buyer’s offer can take into account whether you are taking something of value or leaving extra items.  A full list will need to be completed after the sale is agreed.

itemsToRemove.title: Are there any items, which would be considered a fixture or fitting, that you intend to take? E.g. Carpets, curtains, light fittings, fitted cupboards, etc

itemsToInclude.title: Are there additional furniture items or possessions are you very likely to include in the sale, irrespective of sale price?

waterAndDrainage.title: Water and Drainage
waterAndDrainage.description: Please describe the water and drainage services that are connected to the property.

maintenanceAgreements.title: Do you have any licences, maintenance agreements, contracts or service agreements in relation to this service?
Do you have any licences, maintenance agreements, contracts or service agreements in relation to this service?

Do you have any licences, maintenance agreements, contracts or service agreements in relation to this service?
Do you have any licences, maintenance agreements, contracts or service agreements in relation to this service?

septicTank.title: Septic tank
septicTank.description: If yes, please specify date replaced or updated and date last emptied

cesspit.title: Cesspit
cesspit.description: If yes, please specify date last emptied

sewerageTreatmentPlant.title: Sewerage treatment plant
sewerageTreatmentPlant.description: If yes, please specify date last serviced

otherConnectedProperties.title: Do other properties connect to the septic tank, cesspit or sewerage treatment plant?
otherConnectedProperties.description: If yes, provide details of the properties sharing the system and explain how maintenance of the system is arranged and paid for.

yearSystemInstalled.title: What year was the system installed?

plantOnOtherLand.title: Is any part of the septic tank, cesspit or sewerage treatment plant located on someone else’s land?
plantOnOtherLand.description: If yes, please supply a plan showing the location of the system and how access is obtained.

plantRegistered.title: Is the septic tank, cesspit or sewerage treatment plant registered with the Environment Agency or exempted?
plantRegistered.description: If yes, please supply the appropriate permit to discharge or exemption certificate

plantDrainsIntoWaterway.title: Does the septic tank, cesspit or sewerage treatment plant drain into a waterway (lake, river, stream etc)

enum: No, the effluent is discharged through a soakaway system.
No, the effluent is discharged through a soakaway system.

dischargeCompliesWithGBR.title: Does it comply with the General Binding Rules for discharge into a waterway?
enum: No, it does not comply with the rules for discharge into a waterway.

maintenanceAgreements.title: Do you have any licences, maintenance agreements, contracts or service agreements in relation to this service?
Do you have any licences, maintenance agreements, contracts or service agreements in relation to this service?

utilities.title: Utilities
utilities.description: Please indicate which utilities are are connected to the property.

otherServices.title: Other
otherServices.description: Other services include renewable technologies, for example ground source heat pumps, if you receive Renewable Heat Incentives please provide details and note that you will need to advise Ofgem when you complete the sale

maintenanceAgreements.title: Do you have any licences, maintenance agreements, contracts or service agreements in relation to this service?
Do you have any licences, maintenance agreements, contracts or service agreements in relation to this service?

hasGreenDealLoan.title: Is this property subject to a Green Deal loan or other financed home improvement scheme?
hasGreenDealLoan.description: If yes, please provide details below including any outstanding payments for the renewable devices and any feed-in tariffs and a copy of your last electricity bill

hasCentralHeating.title: Is there full/partial central heating in your property?

centralHeatingFuelType.title: What type of fuel does the system and boiler run on?

otherCentralHeatingFuelType.title: Please describe the other fuel type

centralHeatingInstalled.title: When was the heating system and boiler installed?

boilerInstallationCertificate.title: Was a gas boiler installed after 1st April 2005, or a solid fuel or oil boiler installed after 1st October 2010?
boilerInstallationCertificate.description: If yes, please supply a copy of the installation completion certificate from a competent person qualified under the relevant self-certification scheme e.g. HETAS etc

heatingLastServiced.title: When was the heating system and boiler last serviced or maintained? Please provide a copy of the service or maintenance works report

heatingInGoodWorkingOrder.title: Is the heating system in good working order to your satisfaction?

difficultiesObtainingInsurance.title: Have you had any difficulty obtaining competitively priced building insurance due to the structure or location of the property or had insurance refused (e.g. high premiums, excess over £1,500, special conditions etc)

insuranceClaims.title: Have you ever made a claim against your building insurance in relation to the property?

boundaries.title: Boundaries
boundaries.description: You will need to check your title to answer these questions.  If you do not have a copy, for a small fee to HM Land Registry, you can download both the title register and the title plan of the property at https://www.gov.uk/search-property-information-land-registry.

partOutsideLegalOwnership.title: Is any part of the property outside the seller’s legal ownership?
partOutsideLegalOwnership.description: If yes, please provide details. E.g. parking, garden, outbuilding, accessway, etc

partOnSeparateSiteOrDeed.title: Is any part of the property on a separate site or separate title number e.g. garden, outbuilding, parking, garage?

boundariesDifferFromTitlePlan.title: Do the boundaries differ from those shown on the title plan?
boundariesDifferFromTitlePlan.description: If yes, please provide details of how they differ and why they changed and provide a plan showing where you believe the boundaries are

boundaryAlterationProposal.title: Is there a current proposal with anyone to alter the boundaries of your property?

sharedContributions.title: Other than service charges and estate rentcharges, do you have to contribute towards the shared cost of a jointly-used service such as a shared driveway, road, parking area, garden or drain?
sharedContributions.description: If yes, please give details including who collects payments and organises the work, the amount of the payments in the last year and whether they are regular payments or only when maintenance work is required

neighbouringLandRights.title: Do any rights and arrangements exist over neighbouring land from which the property benefits?  (e.g. taking wheelie bins along an accessway through a neighbour’s back garden, parking, access to maintain the boundaries from the neighbour’s side etc)
neighbouringLandRights.description: If yes, please give details and provide a plan showing the route of the access, parking etc

accessRestrictionAttempts.title: Has anyone tried to stop you using an access way to the property or asked you to pay to use the access?

rightsOrArrangements.title: Do you know if any of the following rights or arrangements affect the property?

publicRightOfWay.title: A public right of way through and/or across your property, buildings or land
publicRightOfWay.description: If yes, please mark the route on a plan of the property

rightsOfLightOrSupport.title: Rights of light or support for other properties

rightsCreatedThroughCustom.title: Rights created through custom or use (e.g. rights to graze on other land or forage, rights of the lord of the manor or others to take things from your property etc)

minesAndMinerals.title: Mines and minerals under the property

churchChancel.title: Liability to contribute to the maintenance of a church chancel?

otherRights.title: Any other rights or arrangements affecting the property?

floodRiskReport.title: Has a Flood Risk Report been prepared?
floodRiskReport.description: If yes, please supply a copy.

hasBeenFlooded.title: Has any part of the property (whether buildings or surrounding garden or land) ever been flooded?
hasBeenFlooded.description: If yes, please state when the flooding occurred and identify the parts that flooded

radonTest.title: Has a Radon test been carried out on the property?
radonTest.description: If yes, please supply a copy of the report and indicate if the test result was below the recommended level.

remedialMeasuresOnConstruction.title: Were any remedial measures undertaken on construction to reduce Radon gas levels on the property?

otherEnvironmental.title: To your knowledge, have there been any other environmental issues that affect the property or garden (for example, these could include air pollution, mining, sink holes, quarrying or fracking etc)?
otherEnvironmental.description: If yes, please provide details. For example the level of air pollution, location of fracking etc, and whether any action has been taken to prevent harm.

excessiveNoise.title: To your knowledge, has anyone occupying the property been disturbed by excessive noise which is likely to reoccur at the property?

crime.title: To your knowledge, has the property been subject to any crime, burglary or violent death?

cautionOrConviction.title: To your knowledge, has the property been occupied by someone who has been cautioned or convicted of a serious crime?

failedTransactionsInLast12Months.title: Have there been any failed purchase transactions on the property within the last 12 months?

restrictionsOnUseNotCompliedWith.title: Are you aware of any restrictions on the use or alteration of the property which have not been complied with?

otherMaterialIssue.title: Are you aware of any other material issue or information which relates to the property or has anything occurred which may affect the average person’s decision to proceed? (This disclosure is required under the Consumer Protection from Unfair Trading Regulations 2008)
otherMaterialIssue.description: If yes, please describe this issue and any action that has been taken, if applicable.

consumerProtectionRegulationsResponse.title: Seller’s declaration
consumerProtectionRegulationsResponse.description: I/we confirm the answers to be truthful and accurate and to the best of my/our knowledge. The questions have been designed to assist with the disclosure of material information and any misleading or incorrect answers are likely to be exposed later in the legal process which may hinder my/our sale. I/we will provide my property lawyer with the additional documentation in support of the information supplied on this form. If there are any changes which alter the information provided, I/we will immediately notify the person marketing the property as well as my/our property lawyer.

maintenanceAgreements.title: Do you have any licences, maintenance agreements, contracts or service agreements in relation to this service?
Do you have any licences, maintenance agreements, contracts or service agreements in relation to this service?

buildingRegApproval.title: Was building regulation approval and a completion certificate obtained or an equivalent Competent Person Scheme Certificate?

deedRestrictionConsent.title: Was any consent under a restriction in the deeds obtained? E.g. if your deeds require consent from someone else to alter or extend the property

unfinished.title: Are any of the works listed above unfinished?

additionalLegalInfo.title: Additional information required for the legal process
additionalLegalInfo.description: A schema defining Part B of BASPI v2.0 spporting mapping to BASPI, Law Society and RICS Data Schema elements.

sellersCapacity.title: Capacity in which the Seller sells
sellersCapacity.description: If necessary please provide your property lawyer with any probate, grant of representation or power of attorney.

enum: Personal Representative for a Deceased Owner
Personal Representative for a Deceased Owner

sellersCapacityDetails.title: Please provide details and provide any probate, grant of representation or power of attorney

legalBoundaries.title: Legal Boundaries
legalBoundaries.description: Please indicate who has repaired, or treated as belonging to them, each of the boundaries.  Identify each boundary as if you were looking at the property from the road

areBoundariesUniform.title: Are the boundaries uniform?
areBoundariesUniform.description: If no, please indicate ownership or those you have repaired by written description or marking them on a plan of the property

haveBoundaryFeaturesMoved.title: Has any boundary features been moved during your ownership or in the last 10 years, to your knowledge?

adjacentLandIncluded.title: Has any adjacent land or property been purchased by you that will be included in the sale?

flyingFreehold.title: Is there a flying freehold?
flyingFreehold.description: NOTE: a flying freehold is when part of the property overhangs a neighbour’s property or an accessway - eg a terrace house where part of the upstairs is over an accessway which belongs to someone else.

pipesWiresCablesDrainsToProperty.title: Are you aware of any pipes, wires, cables or drains bringing services to the property which cross any neighbouring land or property?

pipesWiresCablesDrainsFromProperty.title: Are you aware of any pipes, wires, cables or drains taking services to neighbouring property cross this property?

formalOrInformalAgreements.title: Are you aware of any formal or informal agreements or arrangements for pipes, wires cables or drains to cross either your property or neighbouring property?

testedByQualifiedElectrician.title: Have the electrics at the property been tested by a qualified electrician?
testedByQualifiedElectrician.description: If yes, state the year they were last tested and upload the test certificate.

electricalWorkSince2005.title: Since 1st January 2005, has any electrical work been carried out to the property?
electricalWorkSince2005.description: If yes, please provide details and supply the signed Electrical Safety Certificate (BS7671) and Building Regulations Compliance Certificate (or equivalent)

hasSolarPanels.title: Are there solar or photovoltaic panels installed at the property?

panelsOwnedOutright.title: Do you own the panels, and all equipment related to them, outright?
panelsOwnedOutright.description: If no, provide details of who owns them and the relevant documentation

panelProviderLease.title: Is there an existing long lease of the roof/air space granted to a panel provider?
panelProviderLease.description: If yes, please supply copies of the relevant documents and the name of the provider

lastMaintained.title: When was the system last maintained or serviced?

inGoodWorkingOrder.title: Is the system in good working order to your satisfaction?

isConnectedToNationalGrid.title: Is the system connected to the National Grid e.g. for feed-in tariffs (FiT) or Smart Export Guarantee (SEG)

photovoltaicMeterPanelLocation.title: Please describe, or attach a photograph of, the location of any photovoltaic panel meter

photovoltaicBatteriesLocation.title: Please describe, or attach a photograph of, the location of any photovoltaic batteries

electricityMeterLocation.title: Please describe, or attach a photograph of, the location of any electricity meter

gasMeterLocation.title: Please describe, or attach a photograph of, the location of any gas meter

stopcockAndWaterMeterLocation.title: Please describe, or attach a photograph of, the location of any stopcock and water meter

hasSmartHomeSystems.title: Are any Smart Home Systems included in the sale?

heatingAndPower.title: Heating and Power
heatingAndPower.description: E.g. remote boiler control, solar panels, EV charging point, power storage, indoor or outdoor lighting systems

security.title: Security
security.description: E.g. CCTV, alarms, barriers, doors or gates

handoverOnCompletion.title: Confirm that you will handover details on day of completion
handoverOnCompletion.description: Confirm that you will provide the buyer with the login, password and link to user instructions for the relevant system(s). [NOTE: It is recommended that you reset the password before handing it over to avoid security issues by passing on your own password.]

hasValidGuaranteesOrWarranties.title: Are there any valid guarantees or warranties relating to this property?

newHomeWarranty.title: New Home Warranty (NHBC or similar)
newHomeWarranty.description: If yes, please confirm the name of the warranty provider and the date of the warranty:

doubleGlazing.title: Double glazing (windows, doors, roof lights, conservatory etc)

subsidenceWork.title: Underpinning or other preventative work and/or remedial action relating to subsidence

willLeaveGuaranteePaperwork.title: Please confirm that you will leave all paperwork relating to any guarantee or warranty at the property when you move out

outstandingClaimsOrApplications.title: Are there any outstanding claims or current applications relating to any of the above?

titleDefectInsurance.title: Do you have any title defect insurance policies e.g. for breach of planning permission, buildings regulations, restrictions, chancel repair etc
titleDefectInsurance.description: If yes, please provide details and give the policy to your property lawyer

sellerLivesAtProperty.title: Does the seller live at the property?

hasOthersAged17OrOver.title: Does anyone else, aged 17 or over, live at the property?

aged17OrOverNames.title: Please specify their full names and ages.

aged17OrOverTenantsOrLodgers.title: Are any of them tenants or lodgers?

soldWithVacantPossession.title: Is the property being sold with vacant possession?

aged17OrOverAgreedToLeave.title: Have all occupiers aged 17 or over agreed to leave prior to completion?

aged17OrOverWillSignToConfirmWillVacate.title: Have all occupiers aged 17 or over, agreed to sign the sale contract?
aged17OrOverWillSignToConfirmWillVacate.description: If 'No', please supply other evidence that the property will be vacant on completion.

willRemoveAllRubbish.title: Please confirm that on completion you will remove all rubbish and items not included in the sale from the property including its garden, loft and any sheds or outbuildings.
willRemoveAllRubbish.description:
When the property is cleared out you will be expected to take reasonable care when clearing the property, leaving it clean and tidy and repairing any damage caused when removing items from the property and making safe any light or electrical fittings which are being removed.

Keys for all door and window locks, along with any alarm codes, should be available for the buyer on the day of completion.  If there is any reason why you cannot do this you should let the estate agent and your property lawyer know. For all internet connected services eg doorbells, boiler controls, burglar alarms, CCTV cameras etc) access to them will need to be provided to the buyer on the day of completion so that they can control them or sign up to the service.  If there is any reason why you cannot do this you should let the estate agent and your property lawyer know.

otherPropertyInChain.title: Will you need the purchase, sale or remortgage of another property to co-ordinate with the sale of this property?

moveRestrictionDates.title: Are there any dates on which you cannot move?
moveRestrictionDates.description: If yes, please provide the dates. Note that: the moving date will not be fixed until contracts are exchanged i.e. have become binding, until then you should only make provisional removal arrangements; you do not need to be physically present on the day of completion so long as the property is cleared; timescales to completion vary depending on the complexity of the transaction, length of the chain and requirements of the people involved.

sufficientToRepayAllMortgages.title: Will the sale price be sufficient to repay all mortgages and charges secured on the property?

digitalPropertyLogbook.title: Do you have a Digital Property Logbook?

willHandoverLogbook.title: Please confirm that on completion you will transfer it to the new owner

confirmationOfAccuracyByOwners.title: Confirmation to be supplied by all owners or their representative

confirmWillProvideAdditionalDocumentatio.title: I/we will provide my property lawyer with the additional documentation in support of the information supplied.

confirmInformationIsAccurate.title: I/we confirm that all information provided is accurate to the best of our knowledge and if we become aware of any change to/changes which alter the information supplied/provided prior to exchange of contracts for the sale of the property, I/we will update immediately notify the person marketing the property as well as my/our property lawyer. All sellers should sign this form

titlesToBeSold.title: Title(s) as registered with HMLR which are included in the sale

titleIncludedInSale.title: Confirms that this associated title is included in the sale

titleExtents.title: Title Extents
titleExtents.description: One or more index polygons describing indicative location of registered title from National Polygon Dataset, JSON.stringified to ensure compatibility

registerExtract.title: HMLR Official Copy Register Extract
registerExtract.description: A schema mirroring the V2_1 XML version of the HMLR Register Extract web service.

energyPerformanceCertificate.title: Energy Performance Certificate and Recommendations Schema, supporting data retrieved from https://epc.opendatacommunities.org
energyPerformanceCertificate.description: Mirrors the Domestic EPC Glossary at https://epc.opendatacommunities.org/docs/guidance#glossary

displayName.title: Human-readable name of instructed search product

productCode.title: Provider code for instructed search product

expectedDeliveryDate.title: Date search provider indicates to expect delivery

actionAlertRating.title: Action alert rating (1 is Green, 5 is Red)

complianceStatement.title: Statement of methodology and compliance with reporting standards

localLandCharges.description: The list of individual entries on the register of Land Charges

part.title: Part number
part.description: The part number from the LLC1 form which this entry falls into.

partTitle.title: Part title
partTitle.description: The title of the part of the LLC1 form which this entry falls into.

chargeDescription.title: Description of Charge
chargeDescription.description: The description of the charge, as entered on the Land Charges register.

originatingAuthority.title: Originating Authority
originatingAuthority.description: The authority that this register entry came from. Note that National Park Authorities overlap Local Authorities, and so there can be more than one source of charges.

inspectionAddress.title: Place where documents can be inspected
inspectionAddress.description: The place where the land charges can be inspected. This is typically an address, but for councils where visiting is not permitted, it may be some other description.

registrationDate.title: Date of Registration
registrationDate.description: The date on which this entry was made in the register of Land Charges.

requiredLocalSearches.title: Local Search Enquiries
requiredLocalSearches.description: The results of a standard CON29R search

decisionsAndPendingApplications.title: Planning and building decisions and pending applications
decisionsAndPendingApplications.description: Which of the following relating to the property have been granted, issued or refused or (where applicable) are the subject of pending applications or agreements?

planningStartDate.title: The earliest date from which planning applications would have been included in this list

buildingControlStartDate.title: The earliest date from which building control decisions would have been included in this list

designationsAndProposals.title: Planning designations and proposals
designationsAndProposals.description: What designations of land use for the property, or the area, and what specific proposals for the property, are contained in any existing or proposed development plan?

name.title: What is the name of the plan?

status.title: What is the current status of the plan?

statusDate.title: When did the plan move to this status?

designationType.title: What type of designation is this?

description.title: What is the description given for this designation?

roadsAndPublicRightsOfWay.title: Roads and Public Rights of Way

roadsFootwaysAndFootpaths.title: Which of the roads, footways, and footpaths named in the application for this search are:

items.title: What is the status of the road or footpath?

name.title: What is the name of the road or footpath?

status.title: Where does the responsibility for maintenance lie?

subjectToAdoption.title: Subject to adoption and supported by a bond or waiver

items.title: What is the status of the road or footpath?

name.title: What is the name of the road or footpath?

status.title: Where does the responsibility for maintenance lie?

toBeMadeUpWithReclaim.title: To be made up by a local authority who will reclaim the cost from frontagers

items.title: What is the status of the road or footpath?

name.title: What is the name of the road or footpath?

status.title: Where does the responsibility for maintenance lie?

toBeMadeUpWithoutReclaim.title: To be adopted by a local authority without reclaiming the cost from the frontagers

items.title: What is the status of the road or footpath?

name.title: What is the name of the road or footpath?

status.title: Where does the responsibility for maintenance lie?

shownOnDefinitiveMap.title: Is any public right of way which abuts on, or crosses the property, shown on a definitive map or revised definitive map?

pendingApplicationsToRecord.title: Are there any pending applications to record a public right of way that abuts, or crosses the property, on the Register?

legalOrdersToStop.title: Are there any legal orders to stop up, divert, alter, or create a public right of way which abuts, or crosses the property not yet implemented or shown on a definitive map?
legalOrdersToStop.description: If so, please attach a plan showing the approximate route

otherMatters.title: Other Matters
otherMatters.description: Apart from matters entered on the registers of local land charges, do any of the following matters apply to the property?

landRequiredForPublicPurposes.title: Land required for public purposes
landRequiredForPublicPurposes.description: Is the property included in land required for public purposes?

landToBeAcquiredForRoadWorks.title: Land to be acquired for road works
landToBeAcquiredForRoadWorks.description: Is the property included in land to be acquired for road works?

propertyServedByASustainableUrbanDrainag.title: Is the property served by a sustainable urban drainage?

suDsFeaturesWithinTheBoundaryOfTheProper.title: Are there SuDS features within the boundary of the property? If yes, is the owner responsible for maintenance?

ifPropertyBenefitsFromASuDsForWhichThere.title: If the property benefits from a SuDS for which there is a charge, who bills the property for surface water drainage charge?

nearbyRoadSchemes.title: Nearby road schemes
nearbyRoadSchemes.description: Is the property (or will it be) within 200 meters of any of the following?

centreLineOfANewTrunkRoadOrSpecialRoadSp.title: the centre line of a new trunk road or special road specified in any order, draft order or scheme;

centreLineOfAProposedAlterationOrImprove.title: the centre line of a proposed alteration or improvement to an existing road involving construction of a subway, underpass, flyover, footbridge, elevated road or dual carriageway;

outerLimitsOfConstructionWorksForAPropos.title: the outer limits of construction works for a proposed alteration or improvement to an existing road, involving:-

constructionOfARoundaboutOtherThanAMiniR.title: construction of a roundabout (other than a mini roundabout); or

wideningByConstructionOfOneOrMoreAdditio.title: widening by construction of one or more additional traffic lanes;

constructionOfANewRoadToBeBuiltByALocalA.title: construction of a new road to be built by a local authority;

approvedAlterationOrImprovementToAnExist.title: an approved alteration or improvement to an existing road involving construction of a subway, underpass, flyover, footbridge, elevated road or dual carriageway;

constructionOfARoundaboutOtherThanAMiniR.title: construction of a roundabout (other than a mini roundabout) or widening by construction of one or more additional traffic lanes;

centreLineOfTheProposedRouteOfANewRoad.title: the centre line of the proposed route of a new road under proposals published for public consultation;

outerLimitsOfConstructionUnderProposalsU.title: the outer limits of (under proposals published for public consultation)

constructionOfAProposedAlterationOrImpro.title: construction of a proposed alteration or improvement to an existing road involving construction of a subway, underpass, flyover, footbridge, elevated road or dual carriageway;

constructionOfARoundaboutOtherThanAMiniR.title: construction of a roundabout (other than a mini roundabout);

wideningByConstructionOfOneOrMoreAdditio.title: widening by construction of one or more additional traffic lanes

propertyWithin200MetersOfTheCentreLineOf.title: Is the property (or will it be) within 200 meters of the centre line of a proposed railway, tramway, light railway or monorail?

proposalsForARailwayTramwayLightRailwayO.title: Are there are any proposals for a railway, tramway, light railway or monorail within the Local Authority's boundary?

trafficSchemes.title: Traffic schemes
trafficSchemes.description: Has a local authority approved but not yet implemented any of the following for the roads, footways and footpaths which are named in Box B and C and are within 200 metres of the boundaries of the property?

trafficCalmingWorks.title: traffic calming works including road humps;

outstandingNotices.title: Outstanding notices
outstandingNotices.description: Do any statutory notices which relate to the following matters subsist in relation to the property other than those revealed in a response to any other enquiry in this form?

floodAndCostalErosionRiskManagement.title: flood and costal erosion risk management

contraventionOfBuildingRegulations.title: Contravention of building regulations
contraventionOfBuildingRegulations.description: Has a local authority authorised in relation to the property any proceedings for the contravention of any provision contained in building regulations?

noticesOrdersDirectionsAndProceedingsUnd.title: Notices, orders, directions and proceedings under Planning Acts
noticesOrdersDirectionsAndProceedingsUnd.description: Do any of the following subsist in relation to the property, or has a local authority decided to issue, serve, make or commence any of the following?

anotherNoticeRelatingToBreachOfPlanningC.title: another notice relating to breach of planning control;

inTheCaseOfAListedBuildingDeliberatelyAl.title: in the case of a listed building deliberately allowed to fall into disrepair, a compulsory purchase order with a direction for minimum compensation;

orderRevokingOrModifyingPlanningPermissi.title: an order revoking or modifying planning permission;

orderRequiringDiscontinuanceOfUseOrAlter.title: an order requiring discontinuance of use or alteration or removal of building or works;

proceedingsToEnforceAPlanningAgreementOr.title: proceedings to enforce a planning agreement or planning contribution

cilChargingSchedule.title: Is there a CIL charging schedule?

doAnyOfTheFollowingSubsistInRelationToTh.title: If, yes, do any of the following subsist in relation to the property, or has a local authority decided to issue, serve, make or commence any of the following:-

demandNoticeBeenSuspended.title: Has any demand notice been suspended?

localAuthorityReceivedFullOrPartPaymentO.title: Has the Local Authority received full or part payment of any CIL liability?

localAuthorityReceivedAnyAppealAgainstAn.title: Has the Local Authority received any appeal against any of the above?

decisionBeenTakenToApplyForALiabilityOrd.title: Has a decision been taken to apply for a liability order?

liabilityOrderBeenGranted.title: Has a liability order been granted?

otherEnforcementMeasuresBeenTaken.title: Have any other enforcement measures been taken?

conservationArea.title: Conservation area
conservationArea.description: Do any of the following apply to the property?

makingOfTheAreaAConservationAreaBefore31.title: the making of the area a conservation area before 31 August 1974;

unimplementedResolutionToDesignateTheAre.title: an unimplemented resolution to designate the area a conservation area

compulsoryPurchase.title: Compulsory purchase
compulsoryPurchase.description: Has any enforceable order or decision been made to compulsorily purchase or acquire the property?

contaminatedLand.title: Contaminated land
contaminatedLand.description: Do any of the following apply (including any relating land adjacent to or adjoining the property which has been identified as contaminated land because it is in such a condition that harm or pollution of controlled waters might be caused on the property)?

inRelationToARegisterMaintainedUnderSect.title: in relation to a register maintained under section 78R of the Environmental Protection Act 1990

decisionToMakeAnEntry.title: a decision to make an entry

consultationWithTheOwnerOrOccupierOfTheP.title: consultation with the owner or occupier of the property conducted under section 78G(3) of the Environmental Protection Act 1990 before the service of a remediation notice

radonGas.title: Radon gas
radonGas.description: Do records indicate that the property is in a 'Radon Affected Area' as identified by the Public Health England or Public Health Wales?

propertyBeenNominatedAsAnAssetOfCommunit.title: Has the property been nominated as an asset of community value? If so:-

listedAsAnAssetOfCommunityValue.title: Is it listed as an asset of community value?

excludedAndPlacedOnTheNominatedButNotLis.title: Was it excluded and placed on the 'nominated but not listed' list?

localAuthorityReviewingOrProposingToRevi.title: Is the Local Authority reviewing or proposing to review the listing?

subsistingAppealsAgainstTheListing.title: Are there any subsisting appeals against the listing?

localAuthorityDecidedToApplyToTheLandReg.title: Has the Local Authority decided to apply to the Land Registry for an entry or cancellation of a restriction in respect of listed land affecting the property?

lheLocalAuthorityReceivedANoticeOfDispos.title: Has the Local Authority received a notice of disposal?

communityInterestGroupRequestedToBeTreat.title: Has any community interest group requested to be treated as a bidder?

refNumber.title: Reference number for the planning application; optional for proposals

applicationDate.title: On what date was the application made?

applicationType.title: What type of application was this?

road.title: What is the status of the road or footpath?

name.title: What is the name of the road or footpath?

status.title: Where does the responsibility for maintenance lie?

publicSewerMapAttached.title: Is a copy of an extract from the public sewer map attached?

waterworksMapAttached.title: Is a copy of an extract from the map of waterworks attached?

publicFoulDrainage.title: Does foul water from the property drain to a public sewer?

publicSurfaceDrainage.title: Does surface water from the property drain to a public sewer?

surfaceDrainageCharge.title: Is a surface water drainage charge payable?

publicDrainWithinBoundaries.title: Does the public sewer map indicate any public sewer, disposal main or lateral drain within the boundaries of the property?

publicSewerWithin100ft.title: Does the public sewer map indicate any public sewer within 30.48 meters (100 feet) of any buildings within the property?

sewersSubjectOfAdoptionAgreement.title: Are any sewers or lateral drains serving, or which are proposed to serve the property, the subject of an existing adoption agreement or an application for such an agreement?

sewerageUndertakerApproval.title: Has the sewerage undertaker approved or been consulted about any plans to erect a building or extension on the property over, or in the vicinity of, a public sewer, disposal main or drain?

riskOfInternalFlooding.title: Is any building which is or Charging forms part of the property, at risk of internal flooding due to overloaded public sewers?

distanceToNearestSewerageTreatment.title: Please state the distance from the property to the nearest boundary of the nearest sewage treatment works.

mainsWaterConnected.title: Is the property connected to the main water supply?

waterMainsWithinBoundaries.title: Are there any water mains, resource mains or discharge pipes within the boundaries of the property?

waterMainsSubjectOfAdoptionAgreement.title: Is any water main or service pipe serving, or which is proposed to serve the property, the subject of an existing adoption agreement or an application for such an agreement?

lowWaterPressureRisk.title: Is the property at risk of receiving low water pressure or flow?

waterQualityAnalysis.title: Please include details of a water quality analysis made by the water undertaker for the water supply zone in respect of the most recent calendar year.
waterQualityAnalysis.altTitle: What is the classification of the water supply for the property?

authorisedDeparturesFrom2000Regulations.title: Are there any departures authorised by the Secretary of State or National Assembly for Wales under Part 6 of the 2000 Regulations from the provisions of Part 3 of those Regulations.

waterMeterLocation.title: Is there a water meter serving the property?

sewerageProvider.title: Who is responsible for providing the sewerage services for the property?

waterProvider.title: Who is responsible for providing the water services for the property?

sewerageBills.title: Who bills the property for sewerage services?

waterBills.title: Who bills the property for water services?

currentChargingBasis.title: What is the current basis for charging for sewerage and/or water services at the property?

consequentialChargingBasis.title: Will the basis for charging for sewerage and water services at the property change as a consequence of a change of occupation?

actionAlertRating.title: Action alert rating (1 is Green, 5 is Red)

complianceStatement.title: Statement of methodology and compliance with reporting standards
